document.full_text: an al jazeera journalist who went missing in syria three weeks ago has been released after she was apparently detained and sent to iran, the qatar-based television channel said on wednesday.
document.title: al jazeera: reporter freed after vanishing in syria
lines_and_colors: an al jazeera journalist who went missing in syria three weeks ago has been released after she was apparently detained and sent to iran, the qatar-based television channel said on wednesday.
